meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>orphan</kanji> is <kanji>stand</kanji>ing <vocabulary>alone</vocabulary> in the streets. Orphans don't have any parents and most of the time they're <vocabulary>friendless</vocabulary> too. It's really sad.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
